resources.string: Welcome to the official\nCSUN Map Trivia game!

Know your campus! Answer descriptive questions by pressing on the correct building in the map as fast as possible! Users with the fastest timing and the most correct answers may even be lucky enough to see their name and results in the High Scores after the game is over! Think YOU got what it takes to master CSUN Map Trivia?

CSUN Map Trivia is an
 Android game application created at
 California State University Northridge
 as a Spring 2015 semester project by
 'Team 2' for Professor M. Boctor's
 Computer Science 680 class.
 Our team consists of:
 Chris Bowles
 Victor Perez
 Russell Templet
 Nishika Malhotra
 Maria Velasquez

 Our website can be accessed by clicking the button below, which will exit this application and open your web browser at our address.
